short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate replies with your data in Gmail, Intercom and Zendesk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your team's productivity and boost revenue with high-quality answers, delivered 3X faster.

Hypertype automatically drafts replies using the most relevant information, allowing you to seamlessly respond to emails in your Gmail inbox and messages in Intercom or Zendesk.

📧 Gmail, Intercom and Zendesk
Effortlessly reply to customers with a single click, saving time as the system drafts responses based on your company data and communication style.

🔗 Data Integrations
Easily connect data from various sources, including your website, help center, Notion, Calendly, Gmail emails, and even PDFs, CSVs, and Excel sheets—all with zero technical setup.

🎯 Tailor Your Tone
Customize the tone of your responses to suit any situation, whether formal, casual, engaging, or even for polite rejections.

🔐 Data Security
Security is our top priority. Hypertype continuously meets and exceeds industry-leading security practices. We are ISO 27001 certified. Learn more about our security measures at security.hypertype.ai.

We are committed to continuously improving your Hypertype experience. For any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out to us at support@hypertype.co.
